downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Installing Forefront Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management with Constrained Delegation, Update 1, and FIM 2010 Integration
downloadDescription: Install FIM CM with Constrained Delegation, Update 1, and FIM 2010 in a test lab.
detailsSection: This document will assist architects, consultants, system engineers, and system administrators in deploying Microsoft® Forefront® Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management with constrained delegation and update 1 in a test lab environment that also contains Microsoft® Forefront® Identity Manager 2010.  The resulting FIM CM test lab can be used to show FIM 2010 integration.
systemRequirementsSection:
Operating Systems:  Windows Server 2008 R2

Microsoft SQL Server 2008 with Service Pack 2

Microsoft Exchange 2010 with Service Pack 1

Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010

Update 1 for Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download this document.
